# Details
This workshop took place before the 2024 ASTMH conference in New Orleans, USA with 20 participants from 11 countries, primarily from sub-Saharan Africa, with additional attendees from South America, Southeast Asia, and the US. The group encompassed a diverse range of job roles, including participants from NMCPs and others with direct connections to policymakers.
